frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering at Kubecon North America
frontmatter.registration_text: Registration Now Open for Virtual or In-Person
frontmatter.lead_text: This Hybrid OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held at the Westin Book Cadillac on October 25th live in Detroit, Michigan and co-located with CNCF's Kubecon/NA as well as hosted virtually via Hopin. The Westin Book Cadillac is a short 10 minute walk from the CNCF/Kubecon/NA conference venue.
frontmatter.info_text: This Hybrid OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held in-person and all talks will be delivered live and streamed live via Hopin to attendees around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a welcoming and inclusive space for peer-to-peer interactions online. This Gathering will focus on talks from and by Cloud Native practitioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way.
